text: Mirko Filipović (born 10 September 1974 in Zagreb, Croatia) is a Croatian mixed martial artist who currently fights for the UFC. He is known by his nickname Mirko Cro Cop, which he gained when he was in the Lučko Anti- Terrorist Unit. Filipović also fought for the Pride Fighting Championships where he won a PrideFC 2006 Openweight Grand Prix Tournament. ==Other websites== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Mixed martial artists Category:Sportspeople from Zagreb
title: Mirko Filipović
